content: अपलपनं, अपलापः {@--1@} Concealing, hiding; कृततिग्मद्युतिमंडलापलापैः <ls>Śi. 20. 28.</ls> {@--2@} Concealment or denial of knowledge, evasion; न हि प्रत्यक्षसिद्धस्यापलापः कर्तुं शक्यते <ls>Ś. B.</ls> {@--3@} Detraction, concealment of truth, thoughts, feelings &c.; उन्मुखदर्शनापलपनैः पिंडार्थमायस्यतः <ls>Mu. 3. 14.</ls> {@--4@} Affection, regard. {@--5@} (In medicine) The part between the shoulder and the ribs.
